store_page.short_description: Drive through zombie-infested landscapes in this intense survival action game featuring realistic vehicle physics and intelligent zombie AI.
store_page.detailed_description:
Zombie Car Game combines intense vehicular combat with survival horror elements in a uniquely immersive experience. Drive through procedurally generated zombie-infested landscapes using your vehicle as both transportation and weapon.

Key Features:
• Realistic Vehicle Physics - Advanced engine, transmission, and suspension simulation
• Intelligent Zombie AI - Dynamic behavior with swarm mechanics and pathfinding
• Procedural Level Generation - Infinite replayability with varied terrain and objectives
• Deep Customization System - Extensive vehicle upgrades and visual modifications
• Professional 3D Audio - Spatial audio with HRTF for immersive sound experience
• Cross-Platform Support - Optimized for Windows, macOS, and Linux
• Comprehensive Damage System - Realistic vehicle damage affecting performance
• Dynamic Weather and Time - Environmental effects that impact gameplay
• Achievement System - Unlock new vehicles and customization options
• Professional Polish - High-quality graphics, UI, and user experience
